    • chooseInitialAction

      public void chooseInitialAction​(boolean fromEndAction, boolean fromLeaderCardAction, Message message)
      Description copied from interface: View
      Choose actions: take resources from market. buy a development card. activate the production. play a leader card.
      Specified by:
      chooseInitialAction in interface View
      Parameters:
      fromEndAction - false to show take resources from market action.
      fromLeaderCardAction - true if caller is a leader card action methods.
      message - contains the action that player can do.

    • chooseBlankAbility

      public void chooseBlankAbility​(int numBlank)
      Description copied from interface: View

      Specified by:
      chooseBlankAbility in interface View
      Parameters:

    • checkStoreInput

      public java.lang.String checkStoreInput​(int n) throws IllegalInputException
      Check input from player for insert resources in store.
      Parameters:
      n - number of resources to check. 1 with one leader card depot ability. 2 with one leader card depot ability. 3 with warehouse.
      Returns:
      the resources string in the correct format.
      Throws:
      IllegalInputException

    • manageStores

      public void manageStores​(int numDepotLeader)
      Description copied from interface: View
      Method manageStores lets the player manage the Warehouse (and in case the LeaderCard depot/s when activated) in order to correctly insert the purchased resources into the stores.
      Specified by:
      manageStores in interface View
      Parameters:
      numDepotLeader - is the number of LeaderCard with depot ability activated (could be 0/1/2).

      Specified by:
      showActionToken in interface View
      Parameters:
